snippet.title: Metallica - "Escape" | Haider Ali (Guitar Cover) #Shorts
snippet.description:
“Escape” by @Metallica from the album Ride the Lightning — released in 1984 under Megaforce Records, and produced by Flemming Rasmussen at Sweet Silence Studios in Copenhagen, SC, DK — guitar performance by @Haider Ali.

• Subscribe
https://www.youtube.com/haidertonight?sub_confirmation=1

• Thoughts
This one speaks to me on a personal level, folks. Ride the Lightning has always been one of my favorite records to jam to, and the literal electric feeling (no pun intended) the riffs on this record has is out of this world, can't say enough good things about it. Hopefully, I did it justice.

• Website
https://www.haidertonight.com

• Connect

• Gear
Guitar: @Gibson TV Les Paul Standard Red Cherry Sunburst
Amplifier: @Marshall Amplification CODE 100W 2x12 Combo Amp
Strings: @Ernie Ball EB2215 Skinny Top Heavy Bottom (10-52)
Microphones: @Shure SM-57 & SM7B
Audio Interface: @FocusriteTV Scarlett 18i8 
Headphones: @Sennheiser HD 26 PRO
Midi Controller: @M-Audio Oxygen 49 
Monitors: @Yamaha_Global HS5

Lights: @Aputure Studio Lights

System: @Puget Systems Core Z490 ATX
Workstation: @Adobe Creative Cloud Ps, Lr, Pr, Ae & Au
